amendment.description: An amendment, consisting of four amendments (considered as having been adopted pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 258) to do the following: 1. Commit the President and Congress to enact legislation this year to achieve a balanced budget by FY 2022, and affirm that it is the intent of Congress to not enact any further debt limit increase until such legislation is signed; 2. provide Medicare coverage for certain anti-cancer drugs; 3. agree to the text of the Senate-passed habeas corpus reform provisions of S. 735; 4. agree to compromise language on the House-passed provisions of reconciliation legislation which dismantle the Department of Commerce.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 258, the amendments printed in House Report and the Ways and Means Committee amendment printed in the bill were considered as having been adopted.
On agreeing to the Rules amendments (A001) Agreed to without objection.
